mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANONY_REPLY(REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_CREATE_DT, REPLY_UPDATE_DT, REPLY_ID, ANONY_BOARD_ID) VALUES (#{reply_Content}, sysdate, sysdate, reply_Id.nextval,#{anony_Board_Id})
mapper.select:
SELECT REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_CREATE_DT, REPLY_UPDATE_DT, REPLY_ID, ANONY_BOARD_ID
FROM ANONY_REPLY
WHERE ANONY_BOARD_ID = #{anony_Board_Id}
ORDER BY REPLY_CREATE_DT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANONY_BOARD(ANONY_BOARD_ID, ANONY_BOARD_TITLE, ANONY_BOARD_CONTENT, ANONY_BOARD_READCNT, ANONY_BOARD_CREATE_DT, ANONY_BOARD_UPDATE_DT) VALUES (anony_board_seq.nextval, #{anony_Board_Title}, #{anony_Board_Content}, 0, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE ANONY_BOARD SET ANONY_BOARD_TITLE = #{anony_Board_Title}, ANONY_BOARD_CONTENT = #{anony_Board_Content}, ANONY_BOARD_UPDATE_DT = sysdate WHERE ANONY_BOARD_ID = #{anony_Board_Id}
mapper.select:
SELECT ANONY_BOARD_ID, ANONY_BOARD_TITLE, ANONY_BOARD_CONTENT, ANONY_BOARD_READCNT, ANONY_BOARD_CREATE_DT, ANONY_BOARD_UPDATE_DT
FROM ANONY_BOARD WHERE ANONY_BOARD_ID = #{anony_Board_Id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ANONY_BOARD SET anony_Board_ReadCnt = anony_Board_ReadCnt+1 WHERE anony_Board_Id = #{anony_Board_Id}
